lyrics:
18 contributorsfavorite girl lyricsverse 1
i always knew you were the best
the coolest girl i know
so prettier than all the rest the star of my show
so many times i wished youd be the one for me
but never knew youd get like this girl
whatd you do to me

prechorus
youre who im thinking of
and girl you aint my runnerup
and no matter what youre always number one

chorus
my prize possession one and only
adore you girl i want you
the one i cant live without
thats you thats you
youre my special little lady
the one that makes me crazy
of all the girls ive ever known its you its you

my favorite girl

so girl lets write a fairytale and show em how we feel
